Description: 4 positions: Toes, Arches, Heels, Tendon Stretch.
Proper Form: Heels high on toes; resist in.

Description: Vigorous arm pumping while legs are extended.
Proper Form: Legs at 45°; 5 pumps inhale/exhale.

Description: Hips lift to pull carriage, legs reach over head.
Proper Form: Headrest Flat. Control the descent.

Description: Reach arms/legs, open/close legs, return.
Proper Form: Reach from back; elbows hover.

Description: Complex arm pulls while seated on carriage.
Proper Form: Sit on carriage; scoop deep.

Description: Shaving and hugging motions sitting on Box.
Proper Form: Sit tall on Box. Reach from lats.

Description: Prone on box, pushing the footbar to lift torso.
Proper Form: Lift through heart, not low back.

Description: Prone on box, pulling straps to hips and side.
Proper Form: Reach fingers to toes; long neck.

Description: Arms/legs reach up, circle, and curl into box.
Proper Form: Maintain C-curve; eyes to navel.

Description: Balancing on box in a "V" while reaching.
Proper Form: Open chest; eyes to toes.

Description: Prone swimming motion using strap resistance.
Proper Form: Long line from head to toe.

Description: Prone on box, straps on ankles, curling knees.
Proper Form: Curl from hip to heel; anchor pelvis.

Description: Straddle box, lifting body using inner thighs.
Proper Form: Reach forward to lift hips off box.

Description: Moving plank with hands on bar, feet on blocks.
Proper Form: Maintain rigid line; heels back.

Description: Kneeling on carriage, arching back and pushing.
Proper Form: Lift chest; look to ceiling.

Description: Rolling through a pike to a plank position.
Proper Form: Pike to Plank via abdominal lift.

Description: Feet against blocks, pushing carriage with heels.
Proper Form: Lift toes; scoop back like a cat.

Description: Tricep dips on the carriage facing the well.
Proper Form: Dip hips while pushing carriage.

Description: Seated on carriage; Round, Flat, Reach, Twist.
Proper Form: Pull belly away from thighs.

Description: Standing on carriage, hands on bar, lifting hips.
Proper Form: Use abs to lift carriage, not arms.

Description: Feet in straps, rolling hips up and spine down.
Proper Form: Headrest Flat. Massage down.

Description: Hips high in straps, performing frog motion.
Proper Form: Hips high; reach legs to ceiling.

Description: Ribs in springs, circling carriage out and up.
Proper Form: Headrest Flat. Drop through springs.

Description: Balancing on head/hands while moving carriage.
Proper Form: Head in well or on carriage mat.

Description: Kneeling on carriage, pulling straps past hips.
Proper Form: Kneeling; pull straps to hips.

Description: Kneeling hinge back while maintaining a line.
Proper Form: Hinge back from knees; avoid sitting.

Description: Kneeling on carriage and reaching back for bar.
Proper Form: Reach for bar; push carriage out.

Description: Kneeling on carriage, circling straps overhead.
Proper Form: Kneeling or sitting; move from sockets.

Description: Side plank rotation into a pike-up position.
Proper Form: Spiral plank to downward dog.

Description: Feet in straps, circling legs and lifting hips.
Proper Form: Legs in straps; lift hips; don't crash.

Description: Candle pose in straps, one leg drops to bar.
Proper Form: Weight on shoulders, not neck.

Description: Prone on box, clicking heels together in air.
Proper Form: Beat legs together; lift heart/chest.

Description: Prone on box, holding ankles and rocking.
Proper Form: Hold ankles; pull legs to lift heart.

Description: Prone on box, alternating arm/leg reaches.
Proper Form: Prone on box; long line head to toe.

Description: Feet in straps, rolling up into high candle.
Proper Form: Feet in straps; roll up and open.

Description: Fundamental leg series using foot straps.
Proper Form: Feet in straps; move from the hip.

Description: Side bend toward and away from the footbar.
Proper Form: Push carriage while side bending.

Description: Hands on bar, feet on carriage, full bridge.
Proper Form: Full wheel bridge on the carriage.

Description: Prone in plank, reaching one leg over body.
Proper Form: One leg over body in plank; rotate.

Description: Round, Arched, and Knees Off variations.
Proper Form: Keep hips low; move from the quads.

Description: Rapidly alternating heels under the bar.
Proper Form: Parallel hips; don't bounce.

Description: Small bridge while pushing carriage out/in.
Proper Form: Small bridge; keep ribs connected.

Description: Hands on bar, feet on blocks, performing push up.
Proper Form: Facing bar; tricep-style push.

Description: Push up facing away from the footbar.
Proper Form: Maintain plank; reach elbows wide.

Description: Side plank push-away using one arm and leg.
Proper Form: Side plank star push; don't sag.

Description: Standing on Reformer, pushing legs apart.
Proper Form: Stand tall; weight centered on hips.

Description: Deep lunge with one foot on the footbar.
Proper Form: Deep lunge; keep hips square.

Description: One foot on bar, one on block; push carriage.
Proper Form: Stand on carriage; look forward.

Description: Full split position across the Reformer frame.
Proper Form: Full floor splits; maintain core lift.

Description: Pistol squat while the carriage moves.
Proper Form: Pistol squat; keep carriage still.

Description: Plyometric jumping off the padded board.
Proper Form: Land Toe-Ball-Heel; keep it quiet.

Description: Hands on shoulder blocks, feet on bar.
Proper Form: Lift sit bones; don't round low back.

Description: One leg floating in Arabesque while pushing.
Proper Form: Keep hips square; don't tilt pelvis.

Description: Lift carriage with one foot floating.
Proper Form: Use deep scoop; avoid wrist leaning.

Description: Standing on carriage facing away from bar.
Proper Form: Pull straps while maintaining tall posture.

Description: Hinge back and reach for the headrest.
Proper Form: Keep hips forward; don't "sit" back.

Description: Kneeling on carriage, circling straps.
Proper Form: Keep torso motionless; move from socket.

Description: Punching straps forward while kneeling.
Proper Form: Engage obliques; maintain neutral spine.

Description: Hands at forehead; extend straps up/fwd.
Proper Form: Don't let the back arch; keep ribs in.

Description: Diamond hands behind head; extend up.
Proper Form: Elbows wide; pull navel to spine.

Description: Circle arms forward like hugging a tree.
Proper Form: Keep shoulders down; reach through tips.

Description: Sitting sideways; pulling strap across body.
Proper Form: Rotate from the waist; keep hips still.

Description: Hips high; reach legs long; roll down slow.
Proper Form: Control the "crash" with the core.

Description: Circle legs while hips are lifted off mat.
Proper Form: No weight on neck; keep carriage still.

Description: Tick-tock legs side to side in straps.
Proper Form: Keep opposite shoulder glued to mat.

Description: Prone on box; click heels together.
Proper Form: Lift legs from glutes, not low back.

Description: Hold ankles; rock body forward and back.
Proper Form: Kick into hands to find the lift.

Description: Alternate arm/leg reach on box.
Proper Form: Keep gaze down; long neck.

Description: Deep rotation and reach behind the box.
Proper Form: Maintain axial extension throughout.

Description: Circle torso in a full 360 motion.
Proper Form: Keep feet hooked firmly; reach long.

Description: Side-lying sit-up toward the ceiling.
Proper Form: Keep body in one plane; don't rotate fwd.

Description: Roll back off the box until head hangs.
Proper Form: Use abs to climb back up the leg.

Description: Perform the circle with one leg floating.
Proper Form: Keep hips level while moving the carriage.

Description: Footbar in high position; spiral lift.
Proper Form: Drive through the palm; stack shoulders.

Description: Rotate to side plank from Pike position.
Proper Form: Pull carriage in using side waist.

Description: Hands on bar, feet on carriage blocks.
Proper Form: Body like a board; tricep-style push.

Description: Facing away from bar; dip/push.
Proper Form: Don't let the carriage "run away."

Description: Side plank on carriage without moving.
Proper Form: Lift bottom waist; stack hips.

Description: Push carriage out in a side star shape.
Proper Form: Maintain "X" shape; don't drop hips.

Description: Standing squat while carriage moves.
Proper Form: Keep weight in the heel; upright torso.

Description: Pistol squat on the moving carriage.
Proper Form: Gaze forward; find center of gravity.

Description: Side-facing split with a dowel/pole.
Proper Form: Use pole for feedback, not a crutch.

Description: Full splits with back foot on block.
Proper Form: Keep chest lifted; square the hips.

Description: Full side splits across the carriage.
Proper Form: Keep core engaged to protect joints.

Description: Land "Toe-Ball-Heel"; quiet landing.
Proper Form: [Link]

HS/College Goals: Jumping off one foot at a time.
Description: Watch knee tracking; don't collapse.
Proper Form: [Link]

Description: Clicking heels in mid-air.
Proper Form: Snap legs together quickly.

Description: Keep hips level; rapid movement.
Proper Form: [Link]

Description: Kneeling sideways; pushing carriage.
Proper Form: Move from the side waist, not arms.

Description: Candle pose; lifting off the shoulder blocks.
Proper Form: Headrest Flat. Gravity-defying lift.

Description: Mermaid reach followed by a rotation.
Proper Form: Reach through the "pinky side" of hand.
